me kathandare ethumata kiyanna ooniwela thibila.eeth me kiyaganna bariuna okkoma methuma eda rathriyema gi pada pelakata peralanawa uthurin ena dum riye dewi kawuluwa langata wela...norawan mata dewi natha ma kisi waradak karala...me githaye deweni anthara kotasaka thiyanawa gama harada numbaa giyada...kowil yana hitha walapenne..kiyala aarambayak.me pada tikatanam me siduwima kisima sambandayak na.githaye alankaraya thawath wachanen wisthara karanna ekathu kara gaththu yedumak thamayi eeka.kohoma hari me githaye nada malawath dumriyaka handa ismathu karanawa.me okkomath ekka karunarathna diwulgane gayakayanange gi handata ekathu wela awasanaye sarthaka githayak nirmanaya wela thiyenawa kiyala kiyanna puluwan...

pasudina udasana polisiye shehanwa soyagannawta ohu thama kala warada papochcharanaya karamin shyamali yatakala thana athwalin haramin siti athara chuttege matinge saha waidyawarayage siruruda ee asalawiya.polisiya pradeshawasin samaga ekwa ema sthanaya hara shyamalige sirura soyagaththeya.gela paladi malen saha atha paladi ath paladanawen meya shyamalige sirura bawa age bappa wisin haduna ganu labini.sakapita shehanwa ath adanguwata gath athara usawi niyogaya matha ohuwa manasika rohalakata yomu kerini.ethan patan dinapatha thani wu sama welawakama shyamali ohu idiripita peni sitiyaya.ema nisa ohuge umathuwa aduwimak nomathiwiya.sidu wu deyin pawulata wu awanambuwa sulupatu nowiya.madhya itha ihalin eya wartha kaleya.shehange piya thama sathu siyalu depala wikuna dama siya birida saha diyaniya samaga pitarataka padinchiyata yamata thiranaya kale thama ekama putha miyagos athayi sitha sitha hadagenaya.

palamu kandaye dewani wataye tharaga 3 kin tharaga 2ka palamu inime jaya labamin kolambaa mahanama widuhala 3 wani wataya sandaha sudusukam laba gaththeya.mema tharagawaladi mahanama widuhala wennappuwa joshap was, kaluthara maha widyalaya parajaya kala athara, kolambaa rajakiya widuhala samanga pawathi tharagaya ayahapath kalagunaya matha jaya parajayen thorawa awasan wiya.rajakiya – mahanamakolambaa rajakiya palamu inima - siyalu dena dawi lakunu 113 - sahan thennakon 34, (bhanuka hennayaka 37/3, thanula wikramasinha 8/2 yasiru piris 18/2, dinuka karunananda 20/3)mahanama palamu inima - 96/5-sahan piris nodawi 52, (sahan thennakon 34/3)mahanama- joshap waswennappuwa joshap was palamu inima siyalu dena dawi lakunu 82 - pasidu nayanananda 43, (yasiru piris 20/6)mahanama palamu inima - siyalu dena dawi lakunu 204 - senura perera 66, niduka walikala 38, sahan piris 20.

ehi giya udakandawela himiyo shri lankawehi da pathrakalawedi sangamayak arambaa ayi.oo.je. sanwidhanayata anubaddha kirimata ekangawuha.shri lankawata aapasu pamini unwahanse pathrakala sangamayak aarambha kirime mulika katayuthu pawaruwe “mawubima” pathraye kathuwaraya wu hema da silwata ya. 1955 okthobar 9 wani dina pihitawu ema samithiya ayi.oo.je. lanka shakhawa nam wiya.
